results.title: Need an Essential Chronicler of America? Try This Nonfiction Master

results.title: ‘The Social Network’ 10 Years Later: A Grim Online Life Foretold
results.abstract: At the time, the fictional story of Facebook’s founding seemed overdramatic; now it underscores how our connections have changed, especially in the Covid era.
